text: My gut feeling right now is that if we have the thumbnail view and the actual plot view in two different webviews, it might be simpler to not use react this time around, just to keep things simple. In fact, I think with this design we would not have to change anything about the existing plot gallery view/implementation, essentially we would just add another, separate UI element that makes it easier to switch through plots.
